lmm.controller.admin

Class ManageUserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lmm.controller.MainController
      • lmm.controller.admin.ManageUserController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMainController, IManageUserController

    public class ManageUserController
extends MainController
implements IManageUserController
    This class manage the editing of the data of an user.
    Author:
    Roberto Reibaldi
